schools.name: School of Computer Science
schools.description: Cutting-edge technology education with hands-on experience in software development, AI, and cybersecurity.

schools.name: School of Mathematics
schools.description: Pure and applied mathematics with focus on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

schools.name: School of Management
schools.description: Innovative leadership and strategic management education for the modern business world.

schools.name: School of Medicine
schools.description: Comprehensive medical education combining clinical practice with cutting-edge research.

schools.name: School of Law
schools.description: Legal education grounded in international law, human rights, and contemporary legal challenges.

schools.name: School of Psychology and Social Sciences
schools.description: Interdisciplinary approach to understanding human behavior, cognition, and social dynamics.

schools.name: School of Architecture, Urban Planning, and Design
schools.description: Creative space design, sustainable architecture, and innovative urban planning solutions.

alumniStories.name: Marie Garcia
alumniStories.quote: The program gave me the technical skills and the critical thinking ability to excel in my career at Google.

alumniStories.name: David Chen
alumniStories.quote: KIU provided me with a global perspective that has been invaluable in my work at the UN.

alumniStories.name: Sarah Johnson
alumniStories.quote: I was able to discover learning paths that fit my career goals and helped me launch my own startup.

alumniStories.name: Dr. Aleksandr Petrov
alumniStories.quote: The rigorous mathematical training at KIU prepared me for groundbreaking research in quantum computing. I now lead a research team at MIT.

alumniStories.name: Dr. Amara Okafor
alumniStories.quote: The clinical experience and research opportunities at KIU shaped my career in neurosurgery. The faculty mentorship was exceptional.

alumniStories.name: Thomas Anderson
alumniStories.quote: KIU's AI program is world-class. The hands-on projects and collaboration with industry partners gave me the edge to join Microsoft's AI division.

alumniStories.name: Elena Rodriguez
alumniStories.quote: The emphasis on evidence-based practice and real-world clinical training at KIU prepared me perfectly for my work in mental health advocacy.

alumniStories.name: Luca Moretti
alumniStories.quote: KIU's focus on sustainable design and innovative architecture helped me win the Young Architect Award. The design studios were incredible.

alumniStories.name: Priya Sharma
alumniStories.quote: The global perspective and leadership training I received at KIU enabled me to become Director of Operations at a Fortune 500 company at age 32.

alumniStories.name: James Mitchell
alumniStories.quote: From machine learning to big data analytics, KIU gave me the complete toolkit. I now head the data science team at Amazon.
